name: Agnosia (Room 300 Demo)
description:
"Hey Joe!

Guess who's just moved to apartment 001. I've got something I'd like to give you.

Your Buddy, H."

Controls:

  • Arrow keys =  Movement
  • Shift = Sprint
  • Q = Use Torch
  • W =  Ready Weapon
  • Space = Use Object/Weapon

Who are OtherworldMemorandum?

OtherworldMemorandum are a small team of survival horror enthusiasts who are developing the game Agnosia, a semi-traditional pixel style survival horror game, drawing inspirations from Silent Hill, Resident Evil, Lone survivor and Cry of Fear. 

What is Agnosia about?

Without spoiling too much of the story, our protagonist Joe is forced to venture out of his student apartment in order to track down the mysterious "H". As he ventures into the hallway, he finds all is not as it seems. Tormented by the horrors of his mind and his reality, he must find a way to get to the bottom of the horrors that unfold in front of him.
